summary: 1996 LINCOLN TOWN CAR BRAKE LINE FAILURE.  *MR  THE CONSUMER FOUND BRAKING FLUID ALL OVER THE REAR HOUSING AS A RESULT OF PIN HOLES THAT WERE IN THE CROSSOVER LINE FROM THE LEFT TO THE RIGHT WHEEL CYLINDERS.  THE BRAKE PEDAL HAD GONE TO THE FLOOR VERY SUDDENLY.  REFER TO #02V1001000.  *SCC   *JB  REFERENCED IN RQ03-004
